# ðŸ“Œ **1. Project Overview â€” AI-Powered Interactive Learning Companion**

A web-based AI-driven learning platform where users can:

* Generate and study lessons
* Take quizzes generated by AI
* Track progress
* Interact with an AI tutor in real-time (chat)
* Access lesson recommendations based on performance

Tech Stack:

* **Frontend:** React + Vite + Tailwind + React Router
* **Backend:** Node.js + Express + MongoDB + OpenAI API
* **Authentication (optional add):** Clerk
* **Real-time features:** Socket.io (AI chat, notifications)

# ðŸ§© **3. Database Schema & Relationships**

### **User**

```
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  name: String,
  email: String,
  avatar: String,
  createdAt: Date
}
```

### **Lesson**

```
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  title: String,
  content: String,
  createdBy: ObjectId (User),
  createdAt: Date
}
```

### **Quiz**

```
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  lessonId: ObjectId (Lesson),
  userId: ObjectId (User),
  questions: [
    {
      question: String,
      options: [String],
      correctAnswer: String
    }
  ],
  score: Number,
  createdAt: Date
}
```

### **Chat Messages (optional real-time)**

```
{
  _id: ObjectId,
  userId: ObjectId,
  message: String,
  from: "user" | "ai",
  timestamp: Date
}
```

---

### **Relationship Summary**

| Entity             | Relationship |
| ------------------ | ------------ |
| User â†’ Lesson      | One-to-Many  |
| User â†’ Quiz        | One-to-Many  |
| Lesson â†’ Quiz      | One-to-Many  |
| User â†’ ChatMessage | One-to-Many  |

---

# ðŸ”Œ **4. API Endpoints & Data Flow**

## **Auth**

```
POST /auth/register
POST /auth/login
GET  /auth/me
```

## **Lessons**

```
GET    /api/lessons
POST   /api/lessons
GET    /api/lessons/:id
PUT    /api/lessons/:id
DELETE /api/lessons/:id
```

## **Quiz**

```
POST /api/quiz/generate/:lessonId
GET  /api/quiz/:id
POST /api/quiz/:id/submit
```

## **AI**

```
POST /api/ai/generate-lesson
POST /api/ai/chat
```

## **Data Flow Example â€” Generating a Lesson**

1. User enters topic
2. Frontend calls â†’ `POST /api/ai/generate-lesson`
3. Backend calls OpenAI â†’ generates structured content
4. Backend saves lesson â†’ `Lesson.create()`
5. Backend returns lesson to frontend
6. Frontend updates lessons page

# ðŸš€ **5. Project Roadmap (Milestones)**

### **Phase 1 â€” Setup & Foundations (Week 1â€“2)**

* Initialize GitHub repo

### **Phase 3 â€” Quizzes (Week 4)**

* AI quiz generator

### **Phase 4 â€” AI Chat (Week 5)**

* Real-time chat UI

### **Phase 5 â€” Dashboard (Week 6)**

* Add analytics
* Recommendations
* User progress

### **Phase 6 â€” Deployment (Week 7)**

* Deploy frontend (Vercel or Netlify)

* Environment variables
* Configure CORS + HTTPS

# ðŸ›  **6. Technical Architecture Decisions**

### **Why React + Vite?**

* Fast dev environment
* Easy integration with Tailwind
* SPA routing for smooth navigation

### **Why Express + MongoDB?**

* Simple REST architecture
* Easy integration with OpenAI
* Flexible schema for AI-generated content

### **Why Socket.io?**

* Real-time AI chat
* Scalable communication

### **Why OpenAI?**

* High-quality text generation for educational content

### **Why File Separation?**

* `/controllers` â†’ logic
* `/routes` â†’ API endpoints
* `/models` â†’ database
* `/services` â†’ external integrations
* `/lib` â†’ frontend API wrapper

This gives you **clean architecture**, easy scaling, and future-proof structure.
